name: Canya: The Seriy Dayn
description:
This game tells the story of a gray who has awakened an ancient evil trying to survive.

While driving through the woods to town, Sergei gets stuck in the forest. Trying to find help, he doesn't realize what kind of force he has brought upon himself. 

But?  Why can't he escape?

Maybe someone is just playing with him?

But he has to find out everything and run away.

Control :

Key Bind WASD Move E Interact F Toggle Flashlight Shift Run LMBAttack Mouse Wheel UpZoom In Mouse Wheel DownZoom Out

If you find bugs contact us

disclaimer 

all characters in this game are fictional 

all matches are coincidental
